answerText: A Personal Matter [or Kojinteki na Taiken][10] This Japanese author of Nip the Buds, Shoot the Kids and The Silent Cry sublimated his experiences with his son Hikari to write A Personal Matter.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 14 | 17 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In this novel, Himiko is part white because her grandfather married a Russian from Vladivostok. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel in which Bird comes to terms with his son's brain hernia.
